item.title: `__dirname` in Node.js returns the directory of the current file
item.description: Official documentation: https://nodejs.org/docs/latest/api/modules.html#modules_dirname Notes: This is a different thing than process.cwd(), as the current file directory and the current working directory may not be necessarily the same.

More than 7 years developing high fidelity prototypes for clients big and small, uncluding Siemens, Bosch, Deutsche Telekom, and leading companies in the German automotive industry, with a strong focus on a user-centric design process.

item.title: Colors of Twitter
item.description: Basically by combining Twitter feed data (100 million tweets and counting) with a language detector (together with some geometric post-processing, and lots of hours of coding), I was able to offer a quite detailed look at the language geography of the Twitter universe.
